text: It's been a year since they came out as a couple. And Ariel Winter, 19, shared her anniversary with Levi Meaden, 30, by posting two snaps on Instagram with a gushing message. One showed the Modern Family star in a skimpy pink bikini clinging to her actor beau and kissing him passionately as they cavorted in a river with a waterfall behind them.'I love you': Ariel Winter celebrated her first anniversary with her actor beau Levi Madden by posting two shots with him including this one of them kissing passionately by a waterfall In the second, more formal shot they are dressed up in black for a night out as she holds Levi's face in her hands.
